Title: Doheny Printed - Diana Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With the Doheny Printed Collection from Novogratz by Momeni, vintage sophistication is more accessible and practical than ever before. The classically inspired Diana area rug boasts a time-honored pattern, expressed through a distressed effect that lends a convincing illusion of age.

  • Diana is a 100% polyester area rug flatwoven by machine, the pattern digitally printed for crisp clarity. The low profile design allows for easier upkeep compared to higher pile designs.
  • Doheny collection area rugs are tightly woven from strong synthetics that resist staining and everyday wear for longer-lasting appeal.
  • Stylized botanical designs dance throughout an open field in calming indigoes over a warm and inviting red. This charming traditional area rug is well-suited to formal and casual placements throughout the home.
  • Blot with a damp cloth to spot clean as needed. Seek out professional care to treat deeper set-in stains.

Title: Bolt Printed - Zig Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With the Bolt Printed collection from Novogratz by Momeni, the time-honored Japanese art of shibori lends stylistic inspiration to a range of practical synthetic area rugs. The handsome Zig area rug beautifully demonstrates the softly feathered geometric patterns that might be found in antique shibori designs, creatively reimagined for the modern home.

  • Bolt collection synthetic rugs are flatwoven by machine for excellent consistency and strength, the pattern digitally printed across the top. This piece is well-suited for areas that experience moderate to high foot traffic.
  • Shibori is a tie-dye technique used to achieve endlessly intricate patterns often in calming indigo hues. The innovative Bolt collection channels this look beautifully.
  • Zig is aptly named for its zig-zag pattern that immediately catches the eye, formed from the negative space of broken white stripes that traverse from end to end.
  • This contemporary area rug is rendered in a rich denim blue for easy coordination with so many interior palettes.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot away spills as soon as you encounter them. Vacuum on the top and bottom weekly or as needed.

Title: Delmar - Boho Dots Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Hundreds of dots create a sophisticated, modern design on our Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Boho Dots rug. In addition, this chic floor covering is hand-tufted of pure wool and effortlessly complements a wide range of styles.

  • Experience the natural comfort of wool every day when you add this beautifully hand-tufted rug to your home.
  • Dining, living, and entertaining areas are all the perfect place to display the eye-catching modern design of this fashionable floor covering.
  • Artisans hand-tuft our indoor area rugs into high pile heights, so they feel extra-soft.
  • Rotate your rug occasionally to prolong its life and even out foot traffic.

Title: Topanga - Dasha Area Rug
Body (HTML):
In addition to a scallop pattern that creates depth and dimension, the Novogratz by Momeni Topanga Dasha area rug features fringed ends for a charming detail. This wool floor covering is also handwoven for comfort and craftsmanship.

  • Able to with stand heavy foot traffic, this wool rug collection also offers a soft feel and a handwoven construction.
  • The geometric scallop pattern on this contemporary piece delivers a layered look that's well-suited to family rooms, guest bedrooms, and entryways.
  • Our handwoven indoor rug boasts a low pile height of wool, so it's soft and naturally strong.
  • Keep your rug in great shape by vacuuming regularly to remove dirt and debris.

Title: Karl - Jules Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Modern art and classic craftsmanship blend seamlessly on our Novogratz by Momeni Karl Jules rug. Featuring a geo-contemporary look, fringed ends, and a handwoven construction, this wool and cotton beauty is both soft and stylish.

  • Experience a rich texture underfoot for years to come with the handwoven construction and wool-cotton blend of the Karl collection.
  • Boasting a simple geometric design with plenty of contemporary appeal, this chic, fringed piece offers a stunning backdrop to entryways, bedrooms, and living rooms.
  • A nubby high-low pile of wool and cotton is expertly handwoven by artisans to create our natural indoor rug.
  • Remove pet hairs more easily by brushing with and against the weave.

Title: Jem - Terri Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The speckled, geologic-inspired look of our Novogratz by Momeni Jem Terri rug adds a natural quality to your home, especially each piece is meticulously handwoven by artisans from wool and a touch of lurex, resulting in comfort and a hint of sheen.

  • Woven by hand using time-honored techniques, our wool rug collection is a masterpiece of craftsmanship and comfort.
  • Contemporary and inviting, this chic floor covering is the ideal foundation for a number of spaces, including entryways, bedrooms, and dens.
  • Wool and lurex grant a sumptuous feel and slight shine to our low-profile rug, which is handwoven by artisans.
  • Scrub with a brush to help remove minor stains before they set.

Title: Doheny Printed - Lloyd Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The Doheny Printed Collection from Novogratz by Momeni combines exceptional durability with classic styling for sophistication to suit even the highest traffic parts of your home. The striking Lloyd area rug is just as accessible as it is attractive, designed with a timeless aesthetic that readily complements a diverse range of interior design styles.

  • This 100% polyester area rug is tightly flatwoven, a strong and dependable construction method that cleans up easily for longer-lasting appeal. The pattern is digitally printed atop for crisp clarity and consistency.
  • Subtle rusty reds and brilliant cerulean blues are expressed with a distressed effect, lending this area rug the look of a well-worn antique.
  • Use this traditional area rug in formal or casual placements alike. The ornate borders make Lloyd a charming option for dining arrangements, its detailed medallions perfect for centering a living room.
  • Spot clean difficult soil by blotting gently with a damp cloth as needed. Rotate your area rug annually to promote even wear.

Title: Bolt Printed - Planar Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bolt Printed is a collection of flatwoven area rugs from Novogratz by Momeni, each one inspired by the age-old Japanese dyeing technique known as shibori. The striking Planar area rug captures this aesthetic with charming contemporary flair. The rug's rhythmic patterns are intricate yet delicate, the colors lightly feathered to create a sense of intentional calm.

  • Planar is a synthetic area rug flatwoven from 100% polyester for excellent durability and easy upkeep, the pattern digitally printed on the surface for clarity and consistency. Feel confident using this area rug in higher traffic placements.
  • Rich indigo dyes are a hallmark of classic shibori. In turn, the Bolt collection demonstrates a fantastic palette of denim-like blues both deep and pale.
  • Stippled strands descend from top to bottom like little pairs of leaves strung across vines. This contemporary area rug offers a flattering compliment for breezy interior themes like bohemian, coastal, and more.
  • Gently blot away spills with a dry white cloth before they have time to set. Vacuum weekly or as needed using a low-power suction-only setting.

Title: Atticus - Leon Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With the Atticus collection from Novogratz by Momeni, some of nature's most unique and cherished creatures are celebrated through smart textile artwork. The Leon area rug features an artfully rendered lion abound with enough charisma to carry any decor theme.

  • High-low pile brings added dimension to this handmade wool rug, making every detail pop.
  • This animal area rug features a stately lion stretched out over a field of green, the sunny orange mane and tail serving as an effective focal point.
  • ATC-01 is handmade from 100% wool worked into a soft yet manageable pile. Each end of this wool rug is capped with a colorful casual fringe.
  • Vacuum weekly using a suction-only setting. Take care to avoid vacuuming over the fringes.

Title: Delmar - Wright Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Modern art in rug form, our Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Wright area rug bestows an artistic quality on any room. Featuring chic shapes and a hand-tufted wool construction, it's both soft underfoot and sure to grab your attention.

  • For superior craftsmanship and comfort, this floor covering is hand-tufted of 100% wool by skilled artisans.
  • The modern, geometric design of this imaginative piece delivers a stunning statement no matter where it's featured, from kids' rooms, to living rooms, to offices.
  • Soft wool fibers are hand-tufted to create the remarkable comfort of our high-pile indoor rug.
  • Lighter stains or spills can be removed from rug fibers with the help of sponge and cold water.

Title: Tallulah - TAL-1 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Fun retro influences make the Tallulah TAL-1 area rug a true statement piece sure to turn heads and spark conversations. This exciting design from Novogratz by Momeni features solid coloration framed by a slender border, each corner rounded to cut an eye-catching silhouette.

  • Pure wool construction makes this area rug a fantastic addition to your coziest interior placements. Use to underscore spaces like active family living rooms, home offices, bedrooms, and more.
  • Choose from vintage color palettes perfect for a mid-century modern interior decor theme. These solid rugs are elevated by the addition of a cream border that cleanly hugs the rounded corners.
  • Tallulah is hand-tufted by skilled Momeni artisans. The dense 100% wool rug pile is cut to a medium height for easy upkeep, the edge between the field and border carved for added visual pop.
  • Blot spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting to keep the pile looking its best.

Title: Indio - Ramona Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The artful details of our Novogratz by Momeni Indio Ramona area rug, including fringed ends, handwoven wool yarns, and shaggy touches, make this contemporary piece an instant favorite that's at once soft and stylish.

  • Painstakingly handwoven by artisans from pure wool fibers, this unique collection is naturally soft and resilient underfoot.
  • A colorful, tribal-inspired design pops atop an ivory field on this modern-meets-Southwestern piece, which is well-suited for bedrooms, living rooms, and craft spaces.
  • This contemporary rug features a plush pile of handwoven wool fibers for comfort and craftsmanship.
  • To clean your area rug, simply vacuum on top and below when dirty.

Title: Doheny Printed - Lydia Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy the look of a timeless antique without the worry or upkeep with the Lydia area rug from Novogratz by Momeni. This piece is part of the ultra-versatile Doheny Printed collection, a series of practical area rugs inspired by the classics, all made with strong synthetic fibers that stand up easily to the wear and tear of the most active home environments.

  • The Doheny collection features a design that has been directly printed onto a flat polyester base. This feature allows the rugs from this beautiful collection to be both durable and affordable.
  • Rich indigoes, blues, and neutral ivories allow Lydia to coordinate easily with almost any interior theme. Explore creative pairings to bring out the best in your decor palette.
  • This traditional area rug features a layered medallion design surrounded by ornate borders on every side. Use beneath the dining table, in a high traffic living room, or even within the entryway foyer of the home.
  • Doheny collection area rugs are machine woven from 100% polyester for easy cleaning and care. These synthetic area rugs maintain a low profile for lightweight handling and convenient door clearance.
  • Spot clean by blotting with a damp cloth or sponge. Vacuum using a low-power suction-only setting as needed.

Title: Doheny Printed - Vincente Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Classic styling and modern practicality meet with the Vincente area rug from Novogratz by Momeni. As part of the functionality-forward Doheny Printed collection, this design is made with excellent durability in mind, built to keep up with the demands of the most active areas within your home.

  • The Doheny collection features a vintage-inspired design that has been directly printed onto the flat base of each rug, making these rugs perfect for any high-traffic space.
  • Rusty reds and deep blues allow this piece to coordinate well with so many interior palette options. A faint distressed effect softens the look, lending vintage appeal without the vintage upkeep requirements.
  • Feel confident using this area rug in hardwearing placements like living rooms and entryways or rely on its easy cleanup construction in a playroom or beneath the dining table. The all-over botanical patterns and rich borders will capture the imagination anywhere.
  • Tightly flatwoven from 100% polyester, this synthetic area rug readily resists soil and stains to retain its fresh look for years to come. There is no pile to trap debris, making Vincente ideal for homes with pets and children.
  • Rotate annually, or more often if placed within the path of heavy foot traffic. Use a damp white cloth to blot away soil as needed.

Classic styling and modern practicality meet with the Vincente area rug from Novogratz by Momeni. As part of the functionality-forward Doheny Printed collection, this design is made with excellent durability in mind, built to keep up with the demands of the most active areas within your home.

  • The Doheny collection features a vintage-inspired design that has been directly printed onto the flat base of each rug, making these rugs perfect for any high-traffic space.
  • Rusty reds and deep blues allow this piece to coordinate well with so many interior palette options. A faint distressed effect softens the look, lending vintage appeal without the vintage upkeep requirements.
  • Feel confident using this area rug in hardwearing placements like living rooms and entryways or rely on its easy cleanup construction in a playroom or beneath the dining table. The all-over botanical patterns and rich borders will capture the imagination anywhere.
  • Tightly flatwoven from 100% polyester, this synthetic area rug readily resists soil and stains to retain its fresh look for years to come. There is no pile to trap debris, making Vincente ideal for homes with pets and children.
  • Rotate annually, or more often if placed within the path of heavy foot traffic. Use a damp white cloth to blot away soil as needed.

Title: Malmo Reversible - Grid Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Designed with endless versatility in mind, the Malmo Reversible Grid area rug allows for a full range of personal expression. This piece from Novogratz by Momeni is fully reversible, the color palette swapped between each side to double your decor potential.

  • Weather-resistant materials allow the Grid area rug to withstand the hardest wearing conditions both indoors and outdoors. Use this indoor-outdoor area rug on the patio, at the entryway, in a playroom, or anywhere that can benefit from a chic update.
  • A simple plaid pattern allows this contemporary rug to coordinate well with a wide variety of styles. Select from two different colorway options, each one with a reversed palette on the back for more coordination possibilities.
  • Malmo collection synthetic rugs are handwoven with exceptional artistry in every detail. This collection is made from super strong 100% PET yarns to ward away staining, fading, wear, and water damage.
  • Use a gentle natural detergent and a soft white cloth to spot clean as needed.

Title: Delmar - Agatha Side Triangle Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Create a striking statement with the vibrant, geometric pattern on our Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Agatha Side Triangle area rug. This modern piece gets even better because it's beautifully hand-tufted of pure wool for incredible comfort underfoot.

  • Soft and surprisingly resilient, this wool rug collection is expertly hand-tufted by artisans for timeless craftsmanship.
  • A fashion-forward triangular pattern delivers an attention-grabbing quality to our modern floor covering, which is perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, and contemporary offices.
  • Our modern rug is tufted by hand into a high pile height of pure wool yarns.
  • Remove spills or stains on rug yarns by using a sponge, cold water, and mild detergent.

Title: Atticus - Teddy Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Offering a playful and animal-friendly take on classic bearskin rugs, the Atticus collection celebrates nature's diverse creatures. The Teddy rug from Novogratz by Momeni features a charming bear friend crafted from 100% wool for cozy everyday comfort.

  • A creative application of high-low pile makes the bear motif pop, resulting in an artful almost collage-like appearance.
  • Use this animal area rug to complement interior themes ranging from cottage chic to contemporary lodge. Or, let its comfort soften the floor of a nursery or children's playroom.
  • Skilled artisans complete each Atticus collection wool rug by hand. This fun design is finished with a casual blue fringe on both ends.
  • Vacuum weekly using a low power suction-only setting, but always take care to avoid vacuuming over the fringes.

Title: Bolt Printed - Cloud Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by a traditional Japanese dyeing process called shibori, the Bolt Printed collection from Novogratz by Momeni captures the imagination with its repetitive patterns and lightly feathered coloration. The beautiful Cloud area rug features an intricate design rendered in strong synthetic fibers for practical placement almost anywhere within the home.

  • The pattern is digitally printed atop the durable 100% polyester surface.
  • Shibori textiles are strongly associated with rich indigo hues, a palette that the Bolt collection uses to create calming accents with versatile pairing possibilities.
  • This contemporary area rug features rhythmic circular patterns that beat from edge to edge in whimsical wavering lines. Use this piece to complement a range of interior styles from coastal to contemporary and so many more.
  • Each synthetic area rug in the Bolt collection is flatwoven for durability and easy care.
  • Quickly blot away any spills with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge before they have a chance to set. Rotate annually.

Title: Cucina - Laundry Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Even utilitarian parts of the home deserve playful decor. The straightforward Cucina Laundry rug from Novogratz by Momeni offers a bit of witty fun for the laundry room.

  • This rug doubles as a motivational mantra for those housemates who might need a little extra push to tackle their least favorite chore.
  • Place this useful novelty rug anywhere that it might catch attention or use to soften your step for long sessions at the laundry-folding table.
  • Because this is a 100% polyester rug, it stands up well to heavy foot traffic and resists basic stains. Each one is hand-hooked for artisanal quality.
  • When your Cucina collection rug gets soiled, simply toss it in the washing machine on a cool and gentle cycle. Hang to air dry.

Title: Indio - Beverly Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Blending characteristics of contemporary, bohemian, and Southwestern styles, the Novogratz by Momeni Indio Beverly rug provides a captivating backdrop to any room. The final detail? It's handwoven by artisans from pure wool.

  • Enjoy an incredibly soft feel underfoot for years to come with the Indio collection, which is expertly woven by hand.
  • At home in boho chic, contemporary, and global settings, this chic floor covering offers a modern-meets-geometric design with elements of Southwestern style as well.
  • Our handwoven area rug boasts a plush pile height of super soft wool yarns.
  • Maintain a clean, healthy rug by vacuuming regularly and cleaning with a soft brush when necessary.

Title: Aloha - Hello Sunshine Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Brighten the day of your guests from the moment they arrive at your door with the Aloha collection from Novogratz by Momeni. The cheerful Hello Sunshine doormat goes bold with bright coloration and a playful retro look - a little mood boost for any entryway.

  • Aloha collection doormats are made with natural coir pile, a sustainable and eco-friendly fiber derived from coconuts.
  • Hello Sunshine offers an upbeat greeting in a bold retro font above a yellow sun rising in a bright blue sky. This doormat is sure to capture attention, and hopefully remind visitors to wipe their feet before entering.
  • The 100% coir surface is handwoven for artisanal appeal. A durable PVC backing allows for stable placement even in inclement weather.
  • Gently shake out the doormat periodically to remove debris. Treat tougher soil with a damp cloth as needed.

Title: Aloha - Flower Child Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Fun retro flowers make the Flower Child doormat an eye-catching addition to any entryway. This design is part of the Aloha collection from Novogratz by Momeni, a colorful series of doormats that highlight modern themes and playful vintage motifs.

  • Coconut-derived coir fibers make up the surface, an eco-friendly material that stands up well to the elements and everyday wear.
  • Vivid teal, red, green, and yellow flowers pop against a deep charcoal grey backdrop. This retro doormat design is perfect for mid-century and contemporary homes alike.
  • The surface of each Aloha doormat is handwoven from 100% coir and finished with a backing of PVC.
  • Shake debris from your doormat periodically. Use a damp cloth to gently scrub away tougher soil.

Title: Aloha - Welcome Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bursting with modern appeal, the Novogratz by Momeni Aloha Welcome mat adds a bright, happy accent inside or outside of your home. It's handwoven of coir by skilled artisans for supreme durability as well.

  • Perfect for high-traffic areas, our hard-wearing coir mats are meticulously handwoven by artisans for outstanding craftsmanship.
  • The bright tones and a happy message of this contemporary welcome mat lend an upbeat greeting to your front porch, entryway, or patio.
  • Our handwoven coir rugs are artisan-crafted into high pile heights, resulting in incredible resilience.
  • Remove dirt and debris by vacuuming the top and underside regularly.

Title: Malmo Reversible - Dash Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Novogratz by Momeni takes versatility to the next level with the playfully innovative and creatively multipurpose Malmo Reversible collection. There are two ways to display the charming Dash area rug. Simply flip the design over to reveal the same minimalist chic pattern but in reverse colors.

  • Malmo Reversible collection area rugs enjoy further versatility through their durable indoor-outdoor construction. The smart synthetic composition resists the outdoor elements and readily withstands the wear and tear of active indoor spaces.
  • Clean dashed lines rhythmically traverse the surface of this contemporary rug, working their way from edge to edge. One side shows black dashes on creamy ivory, the other side features ivory over a rich black.
  • Dash is handwoven by skilled artisans from 100% PET yarns. This synthetic rug is lightweight for easy handling and care, with the reversible nature allowing for twice the wear and endless coordination possibilities.
  • Spot clean with a gentle natural detergent and rinse thoroughly with water.

Title: Malmo Reversible - Diamond Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy the distinctive Malmo Reversible Diamond area rug two ways. This creative piece from Novogratz by Momeni is fully reversible for twice the decorative potential – both sides featuring the same charming geometric pattern, but with the color palette swapped to create a different mood depending on how you display it.

  • Malmo Reversible collection area rugs are designed for use indoors and outdoors. The rugs are resistant to water, weather, sunlight, and wear. Use on the patio or in hardwearing indoor placements like dining rooms or entryways.
  • Dashed diamonds and meandering zig-zag lines stretch across this contemporary indoor-outdoor rug from top to bottom. One side features a light tan on ivory, the other side swapped with ivory on tan.
  • This hardy synthetic area rug is made from 100% PET for easy care and excellent durability. Each area rug in the Malmo collection is handmade by skilled artisans, tightly flatwoven to ward away debris.
  • Gently spot clean using a mild natural detergent and a clean white cloth whenever needed. Rotate annually to ensure even wear in high-traffic placements.

Title: Retro - Turnstyle Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Evoking 1970s vibes, the Novogratz by Momeni Retro Turnstyle rug provides a free-flowing design to your space, creating a laid-back atmosphere. It's also hand-tufted of polyester for a super plush feel underfoot.

  • Enjoy a cozy feel each time you set foot on the hand-tufted polyester fibers of this cloud-like rug collection.
  • Able to complement mid-mod, Art Deco, and Scandinavian decor, our retro rug adds visual intrigue and loads of texture to any setting.
  • Tufted by hand, our artisan-made rug boasts a high pile height of durable polyester for incredible comfort.
  • It's recommended to vacuum once each week to prolong the life of your rug.

Title: Topanga - Lucille Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Showcasing a classic cross pattern, the Novogratz by Momeni Topanga Lucille rug offers timeless beauty alongside the unmatched comfort and craftsmanship of its handwoven wool construction.

  • The Topanga collection is beautifully handwoven by skilled artisans using traditional techniques and 100% wool fibers for pure comfort.
  • We updated the traditional cross pattern for today, granting this geo-contemporary piece an on-trend look that works well in bedrooms, living rooms, and craft areas.
  • A low pile height of wool is handwoven to create a super soft feel on our artisan-made indoor rug.
  • Extend the life of your area rug by consistently vacuuming it.

Title: Bungalow - Notch Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Create an eye-catching statement in any room with the bold, modern design of our Novogratz by Momeni Bungalow Notch area rug. Table-tufted of polyester, this unique piece is as soft as it is durable and practical.

  • The Bungalow collection is table-tufted of polyester, which is soft, strong, and incredibly easy to maintain.
  • Vibrant tones and an energetic pattern allow our eclectic, modern floor covering to bring a fun vibe to any space, from living rooms to bedrooms and more.
  • Resilient polyester yarns are table-tufted by artisans into a high-pile indoor rug that's soft underfoot.
  • Prolong the life of your rug by vacuuming it regularly on top then flipping it over and cleaning underneath it.

Title: Iris - IR-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy an elevated take on the simple solid rug concept with the Iris IR-01 area rug from Novogratz by Momeni. Use this fashion-forward accent to underscore your favorite interior placements with a base of sophisticated color.

  • Iris collection area rugs are made from premium wool for excellent comfort and durability in any setting. The pile is soft enough for quiet retreats and durable enough for active living spaces.
  • Choose from three adaptable colorways. This contemporary rug is woven from highly tonal yarns that create subtle striations that sweep from edge to edge, lending strong visual dimension to the surface.
  • Each area rug in the Iris collection is hand loomed by skilled artisans to create a 100% wool rug pile. The pile is kept low for easy upkeep, versatile layering possibilities, and smooth clearance near doors.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they set. Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting.

Title: Delmar - Ultralight Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Mixing a retro-geo pattern with modern appeal, our Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Ultralight area rug thrives in numerous settings. Its captivating look is well complemented by the super soft feel of hand-tufted natural wool.

  • Every wool rug in the Delmar collection is unique because each is hand-tufted by artisans using time-tested methods.
  • Lend visual interest to entryways, bedrooms, offices, and living rooms with the modern design and fun tones of this chic indoor floor covering.
  • These wool rugs are hand-tufted into a high pile height, so they feel soft and are naturally durable.
  • Help your rug last longer by avoiding too much moisture on its surface or underside.

Mixing a retro-geo pattern with modern appeal, our Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Ultralight area rug thrives in numerous settings. Its captivating look is well complemented by the super soft feel of hand-tufted natural wool.

  • Every wool rug in the Delmar collection is unique because each is hand-tufted by artisans using time-tested methods.
  • Lend visual interest to entryways, bedrooms, offices, and living rooms with the modern design and fun tones of this chic indoor floor covering.
  • These wool rugs are hand-tufted into a high pile height, so they feel soft and are naturally durable.
  • Help your rug last longer by avoiding too much moisture on its surface or underside.

Title: Retro - Stockings Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Deliver subtle sophistication and timeless vibes to your home with our Novogratz by Momeni Retro Stockings rug. Boasting a shaggy texture and surprising durability, this hand-tufted polyester piece is a must-have if you love comfort.

  • Experience a rich texture for years to come with this polyester collection, which is masterfully hand-tufted by artisans.
  • At home in Scandinavian, modern, and retro spaces, the cozy feel and captivating look of this piece grants it a highly versatile design.
  • Incredibly comfortable underfoot, our hand-tufted rug boasts a high pile of texture-rich polyester.
  • If possible, shake your rug outside then vacuum on top and below to remove the remaining dirt and debris.

Title: Montauk - Lighthouse Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Channel Cape Cod cottage vibes with the classic navy stripe pattern on our Novogratz by Momeni Montauk Lighthouse rug. The handwoven jute construction of this low-profile piece makes it even better because it can handle heavy foot-traffic.

  • Rich in texture and incredibly durable, this natural jute rug collection is expertly handwoven by artisans using classic methods.
  • Deep navy stripes lend a simple, coastal vibe to our contemporary floor covering, allowing it to effortlessly mingle alongside traditional, global, or modern accents.
  • This jute indoor rug is beautifully handwoven by artisans into a low pile height for easy door clearance.
  • For this area rug, brush gently on occasion to remove pet hair and debris.

Title: Topanga - Roberta Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Contrasting black and ivory tones make the modern, geometric pattern of our Novogratz by Momeni Topanga Roberta rug really pop. This attention-grabbing piece is handwoven of 100% wool for a super soft feel as well.

  • Every rug in this collection is unique since each is masterfully woven by hand from pure wool yarns.
  • Bring some contrast to your bedroom, office, or entryway with the black and ivory palette and striking geometric design of this chic, contemporary floor covering.
  • Soft underfoot and remarkably resilient, this stunning indoor rug owes its qualities to a low pile and handwoven wool construction.
  • To maintain a flawless rug, gently brush and blot before stains can set.

Title: Retro - Retro Wave Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Dare to be groovy by featuring our Novogratz by Momeni Retro Retro Wave rug. Boasting a retro-made-modern Scandinavian style, our hand-tufted polyester piece is soft, supportive, and long-lasting.

  • Enjoy an extremely sumptuous feel underfoot for years to come with the hand-tufted construction of this stain-resistant polyester piece.
  • A wavy, modern design and bold tones add a cozy foundation to any room, from dens to bedrooms and more.
  • These modern polyester rugs are hand-tufted by artisans into a comfy, super plush pile of yarns.
  • Vacuum often to keep dirt and debris from building up and wearing down the yarns.

Title: Cucina - Succulent Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The cute green succulent design of our Novogratz by Momeni Cucina Succulent area rug immediately refreshes any room. Even better, this unique decorative floor covering is crafted of polyester for a mix of comfort and resilience.

  • Perfect for heavily used spaces thanks to its durable polyester construction, the Cucina collection also feels remarkably soft underfoot.
  • Cute and contemporary, the restful green succulent on this piece brings a relaxed, casual atmosphere to kitchens, bathrooms, and more.
  • Hand-hooked by artisans, this polyester indoor rug boasts a medium pile of durable-yet-soft yarns.
  • Vacuum regularly on top and beneath, and remove stains by scrubbing with a soft brush. Machine wash and hang to dry as needed.

Title: Aloha - Hello Hex Tile Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The charming Hello Hex Tile doormat greets guests in a straightforward way, a bold hello with playful flair. This piece is part of the Aloha collection from Novogratz by Momeni, a series of uplifting doormat designs with clever composition and a tremendous sense of personality.

  • Each doormat in the Aloha collection is chic and eco-friendly, the pile crafted from renewable natural coir derived from coconuts.
  • ALO-15 features a tiled design, the word "hello" spelled out in bold eye-catching print. The look is retro yet timeless - a tidy fit for so many entryway themes and front porch arrangements.
  • Skilled artisans weave the coir doormat surface by hand, each design boasting a durable backing of PVC for added strength.
  • Remember to gently shake out your rug periodically to remove debris. Use a damp cloth to treat difficult soil, taking care not to scrub harshly.

Title: Aloha - Hello Hex Tile Area Rug
Aloha - Hello Hex Tile Area Rug
Cucina - Kiwi Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Put your quirky decor style in the limelight with the Kiwi rug from Novogratz by Momeni. This cheerful design is part of the Cucina collection, a series of durable and wonderfully practical designs for the most demanding placements throughout the home.

  • Kiwi features a playful kiwi slice design, rendered in lovely retro greens with dark seed accents.
  • Use this exciting novelty rug to brighten your kitchen, a sunny breakfast nook, a cocktail lounge, or other area that could use a surprising decorative twist.
  • Cucina collection designs are hand-hooked with a low and practical 100% polyester rug pile that readily resists staining and wear.
  • When your Cucina collection rug becomes soiled, simply throw it in the washing machine on a cool and gentle cycle. Hang to dry.

Title: Cucina - All Seeing Eye Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Set your eyes on the prize: our Novogratz by Momeni Cucina All Seeing Eye rug. Masterfully hand-hooked by artisans from polyester, this eye-catching piece feels soft, is highly durable, and adds an instant conversation piece to any space.

  • Stain-resistant polyester, which is ideally suited for high-traffic settings, makes this piece as durable as it is comfortable.
  • Our contemporary floor covering is quite the looker with its captivating eye design, which is perfect for craft rooms, optometrist lobbies, and kitchens.
  • A medium pile of polyester is hand-hooked, resulting in our soft-yet-strong indoor area rug.
  • Make your rug last even longer by vacuuming regularly to remove dirt and debris. Machine wash and hang to dry as needed.

Title: Villa - Umbria Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Take indoor style outside with the timeless design of our Novogratz by Momeni Villa Umbria area rug. Crafted of polypropylene, this fashionable floor covering is an ideal backdrop for living rooms, patios, and more.

  • Our all-weather rug collection boasts a hard-wearing synthetic construction, which is inherently stain-resistant and easy to maintain.
  • The neutral tones and classic, repeating cross pattern of our contemporary rug make it highly versatile, so it can complement a wide range of styles and spaces-inside or out.
  • Loomed by machine for precision, our low-profile polypropylene rug is soft and extremely durable.
  • Area rugs should be vacuumed on top and beneath to remove dirt that has accumulated.

Title: Bungalow - Olivia Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Heavily influenced by Southwestern and tribal textiles, the Novogratz by Momeni Bungalow Olivia rug brings a vibrancy and energy to your home. It's table-tufted of polyester for a comfy feel and impressive durability as well.

  • Resistant to stains and fading, this easy-care polyester rug collection is a favorite of those with children or pets.
  • Geometric Southwestern motifs and warm hues grant a lively look to our modern piece, which is well-suited to dining, living, or entertaining spaces.
  • Our polyester indoor rug is table-tufted into a high pile, so it's soft to the touch and incredibly hard-wearing.
  • This area rug should be vacuumed frequently to extend the life of its fibers.

Title: Villa - Monaco Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Not afraid to venture into high-traffic areas inside or casual gathering places outside, the Novogratz by Momeni Villa Monaco area rug is both versatile and practical. It's all due to an on-trend look and a durable, synthetic construction.

  • Synthetic yarns allow the Villa collection to go outside or stay in thanks to their durable, stain-resistant qualities and soft feel.
  • With hints of geometric and tribal style, this chic modern rug is a favorite of backyard patios, living rooms, and bedrooms.
  • These contemporary area rugs are durable and comfortable because they are power-loomed into a low pile of polypropylene.
  • To care for your rug, vacuum on top then flip over and vacuum the underside, too.

Body (HTML):
Not afraid to venture into high-traffic areas inside or casual gathering places outside, the Novogratz by Momeni Villa Monaco area rug is both versatile and practical. It's all due to an on-trend look and a durable, synthetic construction.

  • Synthetic yarns allow the Villa collection to go outside or stay in thanks to their durable, stain-resistant qualities and soft feel.
  • With hints of geometric and tribal style, this chic modern rug is a favorite of backyard patios, living rooms, and bedrooms.
  • These contemporary area rugs are durable and comfortable because they are power-loomed into a low pile of polypropylene.
  • To care for your rug, vacuum on top then flip over and vacuum the underside, too.

Title: Jem - Stella Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Our imaginative Novogratz by Momeni Jem Stella rug leaves most people star struck thanks to its fun, constellation-inspired design. Just as amazing, however, is its handwoven construction of wool and lurex, which has a soft feel and subtle sheen.

  • Soft and slightly shiny, the handwoven Jem collection owes its luxe look to a unique blend of naturally soft wool and lurex.
  • You may be used to looking up to see stars, but the contemporary constellation design of this piece puts the heavens at your feet, whether you want to feature it in a kid's bedroom, play room, or craft space.
  • These handwoven indoor rugs boast a low profile of wool and lurex, so it can easily fit under doorways.
  • Routinely vacuum to remove dirt and debris from this area rug.

Title: Retro - Classic 70s Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Showcasing a groovy linear design updated for today, our Novogratz by Momeni Retro Classic 70s rug adds modern comfort and style to your home. It's expertly hand-tufted by artisans from polyester yarns, so it feels incredibly soft underfoot.

  • Remarkably soft and surprisingly resilient, the Retro collection is perfect for those that want to treat their feet to a sumptuous feel.
  • With a gently curving design and restful hues, our modern floor covering offers a relaxed vibe to any space, from bedrooms to family rooms and everything in between.
  • These plush polyester rugs feature a high pile height of hand-tufted polyester for maximum comfort.
  • Extended the lifetime of your floor covering by vacuuming once per week.

Title: California - Laguna Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Relax with the casual west coast aesthetic of the California collection from Novogratz by Momeni. The handsome California Laguna area rug is a handmade work of art for any of your favorite spaces.

  • Denim blue fabric strips are woven throughout, bringing dimension to the pacific color palette.
  • Stepped diamonds beat an energetic zig-zag pattern across the surface of this coastal area rug, drawing inspiration from tribal motifs.
  • Each design in the California collection is handwoven using traditional techniques. CAL-2 is a 100% cotton rug, durable yet soft underfoot.
  • Blot away spills with a dry white cloth. Vacuum weekly using a low power suction-only setting, taking care to avoid the fringe.

Title: Delmar - Sorbet Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Lay a casual, cheerful foundation in any room with our Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Sorbet area rug. It boasts a playful modern stripe pattern and is hand-tufted of pure wool yarns for outstanding comfort.

  • Rich in natural texture, this rug collection is painstakingly hand-tufted by artisans from 100% wool yarns.
  • Our decorative modern rug provides a chic, casual design to your master suite, living room, or craft room, wherever you need a touch of visual intrigue.
  • Wool fibers in a high pile give our hand-tufted indoor rug a naturally soft feel and remarkable resilience.
  • Avoid getting your area rug extremely wet, so its fibers remain strong over the years.

Lay a casual, cheerful foundation in any room with our Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Sorbet area rug. It boasts a playful modern stripe pattern and is hand-tufted of pure wool yarns for outstanding comfort.

  • Rich in natural texture, this rug collection is painstakingly hand-tufted by artisans from 100% wool yarns.
  • Our decorative modern rug provides a chic, casual design to your master suite, living room, or craft room, wherever you need a touch of visual intrigue.
  • Wool fibers in a high pile give our hand-tufted indoor rug a naturally soft feel and remarkable resilience.
  • Avoid getting your area rug extremely wet, so its fibers remain strong over the years.

Title: Atticus - Noah Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Celebrate some of nature's most wonderous creatures with the Atticus collection from Novogratz by Momeni. The Atticus Noah area rug features a charming whale surrounded by seagull friends - a playful way to enjoy a nautical aesthetic anywhere.

  • The 100% wool rug pile features a high-low texture for a layered look almost like a collage.
  • Explore a variety of placement possibilities. This animal themed area rug is perfect for coastal interior themes, but its super soft surface also makes it ideal for nurseries and children's bedrooms.
  • Atticus Noah is a 100% wool area rug, handmade with expressive care in every detail. A casual fringe caps each end.
  • Use a low power suction-only setting when vacuuming. Avoid vacuuming over the fringes.

Title: Villa - Cavallo Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Diamond motifs atop mesmerizing stripes give our Novogratz by Momeni Villa Cavallo rug plenty of visual intrigue. In addition, the synthetic construction of this versatile piece lets it thrive inside or outside thanks to durability and a soft feel.

  • The Villa collection offers all-weather rugs that are crafted of synthetic yarns, which are stain-resistant, hard-wearing, and remarkably soft.
  • Bring a chic, contemporary attitude to your patio, living room, or kitchen with the stunning geo-stripe pattern of our modern floor covering.
  • Our durable indoor-outdoor rug is machine-loomed into a low profile of polypropylene fibers.
  • Help your rug last longer by vacuuming the dirt that is on top and beneath it.

Title: Retro - Bullseye Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by artful designs from the 1970s, the Novogratz by Momeni Retro Bullseye area rug offers a blast from the past to your home. Hand-tufted of polyester, this high-pile piece is extremely soft and surprisingly resilient.

  • In addition to feeling really soft underfoot thanks to a shaggy texture, the Retro collection is easy to clean and remarkably resilient.
  • Able to complement Art Deco, modern, or Scandinavian settings, this chic floor covering adds visual interest to any living or entertaining space.
  • Our super plush indoor rug boasts a high pile height of hand-tufted polyester fibers.
  • Routine vacuuming on top and below will help prolong the life of your rug.

Title: Aloha - Family Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Whether the guests coming to your home are family or they just seem like it, our Novogratz by Momeni Aloha Family welcome mat provides a fun greeting at your front door. Handwoven of coir, it's naturally durable, too.

  • Coir is a natural fiber that's strong and long-lasting, ensuring that this welcome mat will endure for a long time.
  • Greet guests with a playful attitude and a bit of flair when you feature our colorful "family" welcome mat on your front porch or back patio.
  • These coir welcome mats are masterfully handwoven by artisans into a high pile height.
  • Avoid using the beater on your vacuum to keep your rug in peak shape.

Title: Villa - Emilia Area Rug
Body (HTML):
From living rooms to back patios, the Novogratz by Momeni Villa Emilia area rug is an outstanding foundation for any setting courtesy of its durable synthetic construction. Even better, its neutral palette and on-trend look provide unlimited versatility.

  • Well-suited to high-traffic spaces, inside or out, this synthetic rug collection is crafted of soft, durable synthetic yarns.
  • Featuring a laid-back, free flowing design, our versatile, gray-hued floor covering brings a sense of calm and modern appeal to any indoor or outdoor space.
  • For precision, our indoor-outdoor rug is power-loomed into a low pile height of soft-yet-durable polypropylene fibers.
  • Vacuuming regularly on top and beneath will help prolong the life of this rug.

Title: Delmar - Agatha Dots Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring an understated, upbeat attitude to any space with the pastel tones and captivating geometric design of our Novogratz by Momeni Delmar Agatha Dots area rug. Hand-tufted of 100% wool, this piece is exceptionally soft as well.

  • Each piece in the Delmar collection is expertly hand-tufted by artisans, resulting in a super soft feel.
  • Playful circles bring a hint of geometric joy to our modern floor covering, which is a fun foundation piece for bedrooms, craft rooms, and family rooms.
  • Tufted by hand, our pure wool area rugs feature a high pile of yarns for a naturally sumptuous feel underfoot.
  • If a substance is spilled on your rug, diligently blot the stain then scrub lightly with a brush.

Title: Bungalow - Tallulah Area Rug
Body (HTML):
A floor covering that isn't afraid to get noticed, the Novogratz by Momeni Bungalow Tallulah area rug flaunts a modern, geometric pattern. It's soft and durable as well thanks to a unique table-tufted construction of synthetic fibers.

  • In addition to being simple to maintain and soft, our polyester floor covering is resilient, making it ideally suited for high-traffic areas.
  • With a geometric pattern and green diamonds, this modern rug offers loads of visual appeal to any guest bedroom, family room, or hallway.
  • This modern accent rug boasts a high pile height of table-tufted polyester, which feels soft and is long-lasting.
  • For normal rug maintenance, vacuum on top then move the rug and continue vacuuming below it.

Title: Indio - Avalon Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Soothing, stylish, and oh-so soft, our Novogratz by Momeni Indio Avalon area rug is beloved for many reasons. It's also handwoven of 100% wool fibers for natural resilience and features a unique, geo-Southwestern look.

  • Woven by hand, the Indio collection is a work of craftsmanship, which is made of wool for incredible comfort.
  • Restful shades of sage and geometric-meets-Southwestern pattern grant our fringed floor covering a mesmerizing look that's sure to create a cozy vibe in any living room, bedroom, or hallway.
  • Our handwoven indoor area rug boasts a high-low pile of super soft wool yarns.
  • Area rugs need to be vacuumed to pick up the dirt on top and beneath.

Title: Indio - Sierra Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bursting with casual sophistication, a hint of drama, and incredible versatility, the Novogratz by Momeni Indio Sierra rug is sure to be a hit. Our handwoven wool floor covering is soft, durable, and has cute fringes, too.

  • No two rugs in this collection are identical because each is meticulously handwoven by skilled artisans from pure wool yarns.
  • Able to complement classic, contemporary, or Southwestern decor, this black and white fringed floor covering is as versatile as it is striking.
  • Our wool rugs are handwoven by artisans into a high pile height, resulting in comfort and a touch of strength.
  • Prolong the life of your rug by thoroughly vacuuming it to remove dirt and debris.

Title: Indio - Feliz Area Rug
Body (HTML):
High-low striations create visual and textural interest on our Novogratz by Momeni Indio Feliz rug. This handwoven wool beauty is also remarkably soft and naturally long-lasting, so you can enjoy it for years on end.

  • Handwoven by artisans, this wool piece is a not only soft and durable, but it's also a natural insulator.
  • Featuring a contemporary strip pattern and fringed ends, this chic floor covering creates a striking foundation piece for your living room, master bedroom, or foyer.
  • Wool is handwoven into a high-low pile height, granting this indoor area rug a soft feel and impressive resilience.
  • Brush lightly to remove stubborn pet hairs and deep-set debris from your area rug.

Title: Indio - Templin Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Influenced by Southwestern designs with a calming, contemporary palette, the Novogratz by Momeni Indio Templin area rug is a true attention-grabber. Even better, it's meticulously handwoven of 100% wool.

  • Experience pure craftsmanship and comfort with this wool collection and its handwoven construction.
  • Shaggy touches, fringed ends, and Southwestern appeal combine to give our contemporary charmer the perfect look for family rooms, bedrooms, and more.
  • These wool indoor rugs are comfortable and strong thanks to a high pile of handwoven yarns.
  • To clean your area rug, vacuum on top and beneath then use a soft brush if necessary.

Title: Kalahari - Domesticated Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Go a little wild with our Novogratz by Momeni Kalahari Domesticated area rug. Showcasing a zebra stripe pattern on faux animal hide, this durable, hand-tufted floor covering adds a conversation-starting statement piece to any living or entertaining area.

  • Mixing comfort and resilience, the polyester construction of this piece is kid- and pet-friendly thanks to its stain-resistance.
  • Add visual intrigue to any living room, bedroom, or office with the striking zebra-stripe pattern on this playful, animal print-inspired floor covering.
  • Our hand-tufted indoor rug features a high pile of polyester fibers for supreme comfort.
  • Maintain a high performance level by routinely vacuuming your rug on top and beneath.

  • Add visual intrigue to any living room, bedroom, or office with the striking zebra-stripe pattern on this playful, animal print-inspired floor covering.
  • Our hand-tufted indoor rug features a high pile of polyester fibers for supreme comfort.
  • Maintain a high performance level by routinely vacuuming your rug on top and beneath.

Title: Villa - Amalfi Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Practical and stylish, the Novogratz by Momeni Villa Amalfi area rug features a durable synthetic construction and contemporary look, making it the well-suited to high-traffic areas, inside or out.

  • Resistant to stains and fading, the Villa collection is crafted of all-weather synthetic yarns, which are comfortable underfoot and highly resilient.
  • An attention-grabbing contemporary beauty, this chic floor covering offers a striking statement piece for patios, hallways, and guest bedrooms.
  • A low pile height of polypropylene is power-loomed, creating our durable, indoor-outdoor area rug.
  • Clean your area rug regularly by vacuuming it on top and beneath every once in a while.

Title: Bungalow - Tri Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Uniting tribal and geometric styles, the Novogratz by Momeni Bungalow Tri rug brings a colorful modern base to any room. It's also table-tufted for outstanding comfort underfoot and is crafted of polyester, so it's made to last.

  • Both stain-resistant and easy to clean, polyester rugs are terrific options for high-traffic areas or in homes with kids or pets.
  • Deliver a chic backdrop to any bedroom, entryway, or living room with the colorful modern-geometric design of our fashion-forward floor covering.
  • Our modern polyester rug is table-tufted into a plush pile, so it's super soft and highly durable.
  • Press firmly with a clean cloth to immediately remove any spills or stains.

Title: Bungalow - Wes Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy a fun and playful take on the Moroccan rug trend with the Bungalow Wes area rug from Novogratz by Momeni. This delightful piece combines colorful decoration with exceptional comfort, crafted from smart modern synthetics for lasting appeal.

  • Bright hues beat rhythmic patterns across the surface, the thick lines expressive and wavering as if drawn by hand.
  • Get creative with your placement possibilities - this piece is made strong for use in living rooms, yet the sumptuous pile makes it a treat for cozy spaces like bedrooms and reading nooks.
  • This 100% polyester area rug is table-tufted over a durable backing for dependable stability.
  • Avoid using any type of brush roll or beater bar feature when vacuuming this area rug.

Title: Villa - Salerno Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The versatile Villa collection from Novogratz by Momeni draws its inspiration from architectural ornamentation found throughout the world – a diverse palette of geometry, texture, and composition. The beautiful Salerno area rug presents a traditional first impression yet impresses with its innovative contemporary construction.

  • Salerno is an indoor-outdoor area rug made from strong synthetics that readily resist weather and wear for long-lasting style anywhere you place it.
  • Layered patterns invite visual exploration across the surface of this traditional area rug. Use this piece to underscore a dining table or patio seating arrangement or rely on its excellent durability in an entryway or a playroom.
  • Villa collection area rugs are woven from 100% polypropylene yarns that shimmer in the light.
  • This piece is lightweight and easy to handle for cleaning, rearranging, and everyday care. Spot clean as needed using a gentle natural detergent, then rinse clean with a standard garden hose.

  • Salerno is an indoor-outdoor area rug made from strong synthetics that readily resist weather and wear for long-lasting style anywhere you place it.
  • Layered patterns invite visual exploration across the surface of this traditional area rug. Use this piece to underscore a dining table or patio seating arrangement or rely on its excellent durability in an entryway or a playroom.
  • Villa collection area rugs are woven from 100% polypropylene yarns that shimmer in the light.
  • This piece is lightweight and easy to handle for cleaning, rearranging, and everyday care. Spot clean as needed using a gentle natural detergent, then rinse clean with a standard garden hose.

Title: Nola Shag - NS-01 Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The unrivaled comfort of shag and a simple, versatile design make our Novogratz by Momeni Nola Shag NS-01 area rug an ideal backdrop for limitless spaces. Its contemporary palette and look add even more to love about this super plush beauty.

  • Set foot on the sumptuous shag texture of this synthetic floor covering, which is surprisingly practical as well.
  • A cloud-like texture and neutral palette grant our contemporary shag piece impressive versatility, so it can thrive in bedrooms, living rooms, and more.
  • Delightful underfoot, this plush shag rug is machine-made for precision and boasts a high pile of fibers.
  • Rotate your area rug once in a while to prolong its life and distribute wear and tear evenly.

Title: Villa - Tuscany Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Our Novogratz by Momeni Villa Tuscany rug showcases the comfort and resilience of polypropylene, which is sure to last for a long time. Even better, this piece features a chic contemporary that's well-suited to indoor or outdoor settings.

  • Easy to clean and ideally suited for high-traffic areas, our indoor-outdoor synthetic rug is perfect for those with kids or pets.
  • Mixing trivial and contemporary elements, this all-weather floor covering is an outstanding backdrop for living rooms, foyers, patios, and more.
  • Crafted by machine for excellent color and precision, our resilient polypropylene rug has a soft, low pile of yarns.
  • When spills occur, use a soft brush to scrub away the stain before it sets.

Title: Ferris - Cali Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Southwestern and geometric styles fuse beautifully to create our Novogratz by Momeni Ferris Cali rug. Boasting a durable synthetic construction, this soft floor covering is incredibly simple and highly versatile.

  • Resistant to stains and fading, this easy-care rug collection is functional and soft underfoot because of a unique poly blend.
  • With Southwestern-inspired symbols on an ivory field, our modern piece brings a touch of visual intrigue to any room, from your foyer to your master suite.
  • Our versatile indoor rug is machine-crafted into a high pile height of polyester and polypropylene.
  • To keep this rug in peak shape, regularly vacuum and cleaning with a soft brush on occasion.

Title: Villa - Turin Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the diversity of geometric ornament found in architecture throughout the world, Novogratz by Momeni offers a globally-inspired palette of pattern with the innovative Villa collection. The handsome Turin area rug captures the eye with balance and repetition – a look you can enjoy almost anywhere thanks to its incredibly durable construction.

  • Villa collection area rugs are built from strong synthetics for use indoors and outdoors alike, a fantastic way to update a sunny patio or decorate hardwearing placements like dining rooms.
  • Turin is a contemporary indoor-outdoor area rug available in three versatile colorways. Intricate mosaics and brilliant woven textures create a breathtaking pattern that offers more to admire with every glance.
  • Smart polypropylene yarn construction allows this area rug to readily ward away the effects of weather and everyday wear, and it also lends the surface a luminous sheen that adds exceptional depth to the color profile.
  • To clean, simply shake the debris from this lightweight area rug. Tackle tougher soil by handwashing with a gentle natural detergent, then rinse thoroughly with a hose.
